hero.slogan: Your guardian angel: ProtègeMoi, discreet and responsive.
hero.subtitle: An artificial intelligence that detects danger and alerts you in real time.

about.title: About
about.text: ProtègeMoi is a personal safety application powered by AI. It detects danger signals around you and triggers an alert — for you and your trusted contacts — in real time and in complete discretion. Your data is protected and handled in compliance with GDPR.

detection.title: AI detection
detection.desc: Analyzes risk signals and identifies dangerous situations.

alert.title: Instant alerts
alert.desc: Notifies you and your trusted contacts in real time.

stealth.title: Stealth mode
stealth.desc: Silent trigger to stay safe without drawing attention.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: Encrypted data and full GDPR compliance.

how.title: How it works
steps: Create your account and add your trusted contacts.
Activate stealth mode and set your alert preferences.
In case of danger, the AI detects the situation and sends the alert with your location.

email.title: Join the waiting list
email.subtitle: Get early access and launch updates.
email.note: No spam. Your email will never be shared.
